content: अभिसंधा {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To hold together {@--2@} To acknowledge, recognize; own. {@--3@} To fit or fix a missile, arrow &c. to the bow. {@--4@} To throw or shoot at, aim at; (शूलं) चिक्षेप परमक्रुद्धो लक्ष्मणायाभिसंहितं <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--5@} To aim at, have in view, think of, (with <ab>acc.</ab>); पदाविद्धं यांती स्खलितमभिसंधाय बहुशः <ls>V. 4. 28</ls> calling to mind, thinking of my fault; ऋष्यमूकमभिसंधाय <ls>Mv. 5</ls> towards, in the direction of; <ls>Mv. 6</ls>; <ls>Bg. 17. 12</ls>, <ls n="Bg. 17.">25</ls>; sometimes with <ab>dat.</ab>; अभिसंदधते ये च विश्वासायास्य मानवाः <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--6@} To deceive, cheat; जनं विद्वानेकः सकलमभिसंधाय <ls>Māl. 1. 14.</ls> {@--7@} To come to an understanding or agreement; फलं त्वनभिसंधाय <ls>Ms. 9. 52</ls> (एवं यत्र नियमो न कृतः). {@--8@} To win over, make friendship with, ally oneself with; तान् सर्वानभिसंदध्यात्सामादिभिरुपक्रमैः <ls>Ms. 7. 159</ls> (वशीकुर्यात्). {@--9@} To declare solemnly, agree, promise. {@--10@} To calumniate, traduce. {@--11@} To add. {@--12@} To prefer.
अभिसंधा {@--1@} Speech, declaration; word, assertion, promise; तेन सत्याभिसंधेन त्रिवर्गमनुतिष्ठता <ls>Rām.</ls> true to his word. {@--2@} Deceit.
